Texts.Chs: 我必须遵循S.A.I.L的提示在这可怕的地方生存下来，并摧毁目标。快行动，没时间了！
Texts.Eng: Having survived this horrific place, I must follow S.A.I.L.'s instructions and destroy it. There's no time to waste!

Texts.Chs: 在这份地图的坐标地点一直发送着某个求救信号，或许我应该调查清楚到底发生何事。
Texts.Eng: The map is broadcasting a distress signal, along with coordinates to a remote lunar facility. Perhaps I should investigate.
